meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Vernonia, typically having purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with beautiful ironweeds swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The gardener admired the vibrant ironweeds growing near the fence.
meanings.sent3: The ironweeds in the garden seemed to dance when the wind blew.
meanings.sent4: The purple ironweeds stood tall like royal guards in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The purple ironweeds painted the landscape with their regal hue.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Verbesina, especially V. alternifolia, having yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bright yellow ironweeds brightened up the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: Hikers marveled at the clusters of yellow ironweeds along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The yellow ironweeds looked like tiny suns scattered across the field.
meanings.sent4: The yellow ironweeds stood out like beacons in the sea of greenery.
meanings.sent5: The yellow ironweeds added a cheerful touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Asclepias, especially A. tuberosa, having orange flowers.
meanings.sent1: The monarch butterflies fluttered around the orange ironweeds in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The orange ironweeds attracted bees with their vibrant blooms.
meanings.sent3: The orange ironweeds seemed to glow in the afternoon sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The orange ironweeds stood out like flames amidst the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The orange ironweeds added a fiery touch to the garden.
